title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The chart shows the Minutes of at the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily street .
\\n The highest Minutes was 181 in the 45-54 Age followed by 157 % in the 25-34 Age , 181 % in 45-54 and finally 73 % in 55-64 .
gold: The chart shows that the younger you are the more time spent on social media daily in Maputo . It shows that people around the age of 15 to 24 spent roughly around 180 minutes on social media with the number going down the older they get being at only 80 minutes at age 55 to 64
